parameter.name: cmApiUrl
parameter.description: API url of campaign monitor.

parameter.name: cmAccessToken
parameter.description: The access token to authorize the requests to campaign monitor.

parameter.name: cmClientId
parameter.description: The id of the client for whom the campaign should be created.

parameter.name: cmName
parameter.description: Name of the campaign.

parameter.name: cmSubject
parameter.description: Subject of the campaign.

parameter.name: cmFromName
parameter.description: Campaign senders name.

parameter.name: cmFromEmail
parameter.description: Campaign senders email.

parameter.name: cmReplyTo
parameter.description: Email address to reply for the campaign.

parameter.name: cmListIds
parameter.description: List of subscribers ids.

parameter.name: cmSegmentIds
parameter.description: List of segment Ids.

parameter.name: cmTemplateId
parameter.description: Id of the template.

parameter.name: cmTemplateContent
parameter.description: Content of the campaign template.

parameter.name: fbApiUrl
parameter.description: API url of Facebook.

parameter.name: fbAccessToken
parameter.description: Access token which provides temporary, secure access to Facebook APIs.

parameter.name: fbConnection
parameter.description: The connection which belongs to an object.

parameter.name: fbMessageBody
parameter.description: The main message body of the post.

parameter.name: fbLink
parameter.description: The URL of a link to attach to the post.

parameter.name: fbPicture
parameter.description: Determines the preview image associated with the link.

parameter.name: fbName
parameter.description: Overwrites the title of the link preview.

parameter.name: fbCaption
parameter.description: Overwrites the caption under the title in the link preview.

parameter.name: fbDescription
parameter.description: Overwrites the description in the link preview.

parameter.name: fbActions
parameter.description: The action links attached to the post.

parameter.name: fbPlace
parameter.description: Page ID of a location associated with this post.

parameter.name: fbTags
parameter.description: List of user IDs of people tagged in this post.

parameter.name: fbPrivacy
parameter.description: Determines the privacy settings of the post.

parameter.name: fbObjectAttachment
parameter.description: Facebook ID for an existing picture in the person's photo albums to use as the thumbnail image.

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Campaign was successfully created with campaign id ',get-property('cmpaignId'),'.')

property.name: message
property.expression: fn:concat('Facebook wall post was successfully created with wall post id ',get-property('fbPostId'),'.')
